mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (MESSAGE_IDX, MESSAGE_SENDER, MESSAGE_RECEIVER, MESSAGE_TITLE, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_REGDATE, MESSAGE_READ) VALUES (MESSAGE_SEND_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{message_sender}, #{message_receiver}, #{message_title}, #{message_content}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT SEND.*, PI.P_ROUTE FROM MESSAGE_SEND SEND, PROFILE_IMAGE PI WHERE SEND.SEND_RECEIVER = PI.M_ID AND SEND.SEND_SENDER = #{send_sender} AND PI.P_MAIN = 1

SELECT RECEIVE.*, PI.P_ROUTE FROM MESSAGE_RECEIVE RECEIVE, PROFILE_IMAGE PI WHERE RECEIVE.RECEIVE_SENDER = PI.M_ID AND RECEIVE.RECEIVE_RECEIVER = #{receive_receiver} AND PI.P_MAIN = 1 ORDER BY RECEIVE_IDX DESC
SELECT * FROM MESSAGE_RECEIVE WHERE RECEIVE_RECEIVER = #{receive_receiver} ORDER BY RECEIVE_IDX DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE_RECEIVE WHERE RECEIVE_RECEIVER = #{receive_receiver} AND RECEIVE_READ = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE MESSAGE_SEND SET SEND_READ = 1 WHERE SEND_IDX = #{send_idx}
UPDATE MESSAGE_RECEIVE SET RECEIVE_READ = 1 WHERE RECEIVE_IDX = #{receive_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE_RECEIVE WHERE RECEIVE_READ = 0 AND RECEIVE_RECEIVER = #{receive_receiver}
